mapper.insert: insert into users_tb(user_id, username, name, email, password, phone_number, img, created_at) values(0, #{username}, #{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phoneNumber}, #{img}, now())
mapper.select: select ut.user_id, ut.username, ut.name, ut.email, ut.phone_number, ut.point, ut.img, ut.password, ut.created_at, urt.user_roles_id, urt.user_id as urt_user_id, urt.role_id as urt_role_id, rt.role_id, rt.name as role_name from users_tb ut left outer join user_roles_tb urt on (ut.user_id = urt.user_id) left outer join roles_tb rt on (rt.role_id = urt.role_id) where ut.username = #{username}

select ut.user_id, ut.username, ut.name, ut.email, ut.phone_number, ut.point, ut.img, ut.password, ut.created_at, urt.user_roles_id, urt.user_id as urt_user_id, urt.role_id as urt_role_id, rt.role_id, rt.name as role_name from users_tb ut left outer join user_roles_tb urt on (ut.user_id = urt.user_id) left outer join roles_tb rt on (rt.role_id = urt.role_id) where ut.user_id = #{id}
select count(*) from users_tb where name = #{name}
